name: Sylvetica
comment:
>>38204647

You walk and talk, communicating with Ayla as you head toward the warehouse gates.

> [[ UI Messenger â€“ Ayla ]]
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Alright, I've had enough of this. I'm on my way back to my hall if you still need me. ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Maybe in a minute. I've got an errand to run, and I'm probably going to go farm afterward.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: But we're planning to go to the Sanctum when Nel comes back online.
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Want to come along, and see if Kjorikos has any more fancy tech hidden away?
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Oh, fuck yes. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( How many are in your group now? ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: It's me, Aelriss, and Tats right now.
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Pfft. Tell me you're not calling her that. ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: I don't think she'd understand me even if I did.
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Lol. She's my favorite. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( So it'd be five with me? ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Mhm
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Damn. I'll have to think about it. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( I've sort of got some responsibilities. I wanted to bring Dorian. At least then I could pretend I was doing something for the Keepers, rather than for just me. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Plus I kind of wanted to stay here and RP, maybe take a quick break. ))
> [[ Ayla ]]: (( Let me know when you're going down and I'll see. At the very least, we should chat sometime. ))
> [[ Ascheritte ]]: Alright, will do.

The city gate comes into view. It looks like the guardsmen are still on a bit of an alert, with a few more stationed here than the last time you came through. You see Smith standing a little ways out, and further beyond, there's some players in starter gear trading blows with little purple crawlers.

> [[ Continued ]]
